channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: TMC - Defects - Kerbs and Channels problem, 14th May
item.description:
28 day with give an take plus temporary footway closure needed please repair chipped kerb stone with concrete fillet 200x150x30mm number 1 (CW Edge Kerbing & Channels)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Vegetation problem, 14th May
item.description:
28 day with 3 way traffic lights please cut back overgrown vegetation an bramble and stinging netels and long grass verge plus overgrown tree branches hanging obstruction to pulling out of road appropriately 50 meters x3 metres high (Overgrown Hedge)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 14th May
item.description:
Tree is damaging the customers hedge. Tree is causing issues for the customer. Possibly causing issues with the phone line too. Needs bringing down in size.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocking visibility on road/junction (Grass/verge) problem, 14th May
item.description:
Lots of vegetation and flowering cow parsley obstructing this junction to join the A436
Report on FixMyStreet
